abstract: Stops mirroring the workout session to the companion iOS device.
overview:
## Discussion

Call this method in your watchOS app to stop the mirrored workout session on the companion iOS app. After the mirroring stops, the system calls the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutSessionDelegate/workoutSession(_:didDisconnectFromRemoteDeviceWithError:)] method on the iOS companion’s session delegate.

items.description: Starts mirroring the workout session to the companion iOS device.
items.name: startMirroringToCompanionDevice(completion:)

items.description: Sends the provided data to the remote workout session.
items.name: sendToRemoteWorkoutSession(data:completion:)

title: stopMirroringToCompanionDevice(completion:)
